detectors.description: Recipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,ERC20,bytes) () uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: ! _token.transferFrom(_from,this,_value) ()

Reentrancy in Congress.executeProposal(uint256,bytes) ():
	External calls:
	- ! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- p.proposalPassed = true ()
	Congress.proposals () can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Congress.checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint256,bytes) ()
	- Congress.executeProposal(uint256,bytes) ()
	- Congress.newProposal(address,uint256,string,bytes) ()
	- Congress.numProposals() ()
	- Congress.vote(uint256,bool,string) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Congress.executeProposal(uint256,bytes)]():
	External calls:
	- [! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [p.proposalPassed = true]()
	[Congress.proposals]() can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Congress.checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint256,bytes)]()
	- [Congress.executeProposal(uint256,bytes)]()
	- [Congress.newProposal(address,uint256,string,bytes)]()
	- [Congress.numProposals()]()
	- [Congress.vote(uint256,bool,string)]()

detectors.description:
Congress.checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint256,bytes) () uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- proposals[id].proposalHash == sha3()(beneficiary,amount,transactionBytecode) ()

Congress.vote(uint256,bool,string).vote () shadows:
	- Congress.vote(uint256,bool,string) () (function)

Owned.setOwner(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- owner = _owner ()

Destroyable.setHammer(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- hammer = _hammer ()

Destroyable.setHammer(address)._hammer () lacks a zero-check on :
		- hammer = _hammer ()

Owned.setOwner(address)._owner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner ()

Reentrancy in Recipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,ERC20,bytes) ():
	External calls:
	- ! _token.transferFrom(_from,this,_value) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ReceivedTokens(_from,_value,_token,_extraData) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Recipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,ERC20,bytes)]():
	External calls:
	- [! _token.transferFrom(_from,this,_value)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ReceivedTokens(_from,_value,_token,_extraData)]()

detectors.description:
Low level call in Congress.executeProposal(uint256,bytes) ():
	- ! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) ()

Parameter Destroyable.setHammer(address)._hammer () is not in mixedCase
